pr_title: Quartz - improve the error message when scheduler is disabled and org.quartz.Scheduler is injected

timeline.message:
Quartz - improve the error message when scheduler is disabled...

... and org.quartz.Scheduler is injected

timeline.bodyText:
I'm not entirely sure how this link will be rendered in the HTML. We need it to end up being quartz without any extension.
Could you check?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: It renders just fine. Actually, it's the only way I found to link a section from a different document. See https://asciidoctor.org/docs/user-manual/#inter-document-cross-references.
replies.author: mkouba

replies.bodyText: My fear was that it renders with .html at the end which would not help with SEO.
replies.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Yeah and that's exactly what happens unfortunately.
replies.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
I think I fixed the issue here: quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io#661 .
But if another pair of eyes can check that I didn't break something else, that would be welcome!
